document.full_text: warren buffett said he expects the congress to raise the nation's debt ceiling before it expires in mid-may, and said it would be that body's "most asinine act" ever if it failed.
document.title: buffett: failure to raise debt ceiling "asinine"
lines_and_colors: warren buffett said he expects the congress to raise the nation's debt ceiling before it expires in mid-may, and said it would be that body's "most asinine act" ever if it failed.
